name: Bomb -alpha
description:
Bomb is a story-driven action-adventure game, inspired by the classic 80's game Bomberman. In this game, you play Pete who is a Gaming enthusiast. Pete's crazy passion for games drives him to a mysterious island where he meets Bomb, another one of the main character of this game. The game is about the journey of Pete from a crazy lunatic to a humble being, as he discovers different aspects of his life by being on the mystery island along with mystery characters. 

This is the alpha version of the gameplay which showcases just the mechanics of the game. The story element is still kept secret, So enjoy the game play, and register your feedback, and we will address them. Happy Gaming
